text: Mandailing Natal, abbreviated as Madina, is a regency in North Sumatra Province of Indonesia. It covers an area of 6,620.7 square kilometres and according to the 2010 census had a population of 403,894 people; the latest official estimate (as at mid 2017) is 439,505.Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2020. The capital lies at Panyabungan. ==Administration== At the 2010 Census, the regency was divided into eighteen districts (kecamatan). Subsequently, five additional districts (indicated by asterisks in the table below) have been created by the division of existing districts. The twenty-three districts are tabulated below with their areas and their 2010 Census population,Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. together with the estimated populations in mid 2017:Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2020. The table also includes the number of administrative villages (desa and kelurahan, 404 in total) in each district and its post code. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !
